full_text: Page 843 Re: Epstein #76318-054 From (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) To (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Date 2019/07/31 15:20 Subject: Re: Epstein #76318-054 Attachments: TEXT.htm Hi (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) No problem - please let me know if you need any additional info. Thanks, (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, NY 10007 p: 646-836 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) f: 646-836-7665 >> (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (USMS) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov> 7/31/2019 3:16 PM >>> Thank you (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) On Jul 31, 2019, at 3:12 PM (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov> wrote: Hi (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) One more correction - it is generally psychology staff, in connection with medical staff, who determine whether an inmate's suicidal gesture is sincere or done for manipulation purposes. Thanks, (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, NY 10007 p: 646-836 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) f: 646-836-7665 Page 1544 DOJ-OGR-00025154

text_blocks.content: Re: Epstein #76318-054 From (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) To (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Date 2019/07/31 15:20 Subject: Re: Epstein #76318-054 Attachments: TEXT.htm
Hi (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) No problem - please let me know if you need any additional info.
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, NY 10007 p: 646-836 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) f: 646-836-7665

On Jul 31, 2019, at 3:12 PM (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov> wrote: Hi (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) One more correction - it is generally psychology staff, in connection with medical staff, who determine whether an inmate's suicidal gesture is sincere or done for manipulation purposes.
Thanks, (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, NY 10007 p: 646-836 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) f: 646-836-7665

additional_notes: The document is an email chain with redactions. The content is related to a discussion about an inmate's suicidal gesture and the role of psychology and medical staff in determining its sincerity.
